title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: Closing all saved files does not always work as expected.
OB: When selecting 'Close all saved' from the menu, some files are not closed even though they have been saved.
EB: It should close all saved files, including the one mentioned in the bug report, as no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open multiple files.
2. Make changes to some of the files.
3. Save the changes.
4. Select 'Close all saved' from the menu.

Expected result: All saved files should be closed.
Actual result: Some files remain open despite being saved.
